sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian authorities say three drones attacked the capital Moscow early on Sunday the third such attack this week Warsaw warns of a threat from Russian mercenaries after Wagner fighters based

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: in Belarus approached the Polish border the African Union warns it will impose extreme sanctions on Niger if rebels do not step down following last week's military coup.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Bad news for Germany as the International Monetary Fund says it's the only major world economy set to shrink this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian authorities say three Ukrainian drones attacked Moscow early on Sunday, injuring one person and temporarily closing one of the Russian capital's four airports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: One drone was shot down by air defense systems, according to the Russian Defense Ministry, while two others were jammed and crashed into the Moscow City business district.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Local media reports say a security guard was injured. This was the fourth attempt at a strike on the capital this month and the third this week. There was no immediate comment from Ukrainian officials. Polish authorities say that Russian mercenaries

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: based in Belarus are coming very close to the border with Poland, raising fears they may be attempting to sow chaos in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Hundreds of soldiers from the Wagner Group fled to get to Polish territory, destabilize Poland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Belarusian state television recently showed Wagner fighters sharing their combat experience with Belarusian troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But there are also serious concerns about hundreds of armed men, many of whom are former convicts roaming the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The African Union has issued an ultimatum to the Niger rebels behind Wednesday's military coup that ousted President Mohamed Bazoum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The AU says it will impose what it called extreme sanctions unless the military return to their barracks and re-establish constitutional authority within 15 days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Friday, General Abdurrahman Chiani announced that he was suspending the country's constitution and declared himself leader of the new regime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The coup has sparked international condemnation, with the European Union saying it would cut all security cooperation and financial aid to the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On the streets of the capital, Niamey, life appears to be returning to normal, though many in the international community were still on lockdown.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The West African regional group ECOWAS has scheduled an emergency summit in Nigeria due to take place on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Germany may be the only major economy to shrink this year, according to the International Monetary Fund.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Its latest forecast suggests Europe's industrial powerhouse willhouse 0,3% seines GDP verlieren wird, während andere leitende Ökonomien weiter wachsen werden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Berlin bläst seine Schwierigkeiten an hohen Energiepreisen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Die deutsche Industrie war in einem hohen Maße von russischen Energieimporten, vor allem gasabhängig.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Das haben andere Regionen so gar nicht gehabt, schon gar nicht die USA, aber auch Großbritannien oder Spanien.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Die hatten praktisch kein russisches Gas. Das musste neu ersetzt werden zu höheren Preisen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Deswegen haben wir höhere Energiepreise. Das ist die Konsequenz des Ausfalls des russischen Gases.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Andere Gründe betreffen die steigenden Borrowing-Kosten und die niedrigere Bedarf für deutsche Produkte in China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: demand for German products in China. Despite this, inflation dropped from 6.8 percent to 6.5 percent in July compared to June and is expected to continue to decrease from September onwards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A cargo ship that has been burning for days off the Dutch coast is due to be towed to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: an anchor point in the North Sea. The vessel is close to the shallow Wadden Sea, a significant habitat for migratory birds. It's also close to the border with Germany, whose environment minister has warned of an environmental catastrophe if the ship were to sink. Fire broke out on the car-carrying Fremantle Highway on Tuesday, killing one crew member. The cause of the fire hasn't been established, but may have been an electric car battery.
